name: Spaceman (itch) (mcken288)
description:
Added New music I made in GarageBand.  

Added a new color palate on the suit of the player character. 

Added a new sprite for the buttons, so that they turn green when cursor is on it. 

Added instructions in the about tab.

Added a new larger level in replacement of tutorial level. I do this for two levels. Which have different level layout that test different skills. 

-Created By Zachary McKenzie
